Developer Terms of Use
des: Sound Chat Radio owned and operated by Irish and Chin Inc. is a leading media entity in the New York Tri-State Caribbean Diaspora and beyond. The station covers socio-cultural and political topics that spark much-needed discussions, keeping listeners informed and entertained while allowing them to voice their opinions on pertinent matters at home and abroad.
